events.description: DJ LeMahieu walks.
Aaron Judge reaches on a fielder's choice, fielded by third baseman Jose Ramirez. DJ LeMahieu to 2nd. DJ LeMahieu advances to 2nd, on a fielding error by third baseman Jose Ramirez.
